rulings.text: In the case of multiple libraries, you can shuffle a library other than the one you scried from because they are two separate spell effects.

cards.name: Holy Reverence
cards.originalText: Damage can't reduce your life total to less than X, where X is the number of creatures you control.

rulings.text: Holy Reverence does not prevent damage. It causes some damage to be unable to lower your life total. So any damage rendered useless by Holy Reverence was still dealt and is counted by effects that track the amount of damage done to a player. In addition, Holy Reverence does not prevent loss of life, so loss of life bypasses Holy Reverence.

cards.text: Damage can't reduce your life total to less than X, where X is the number of creatures you control.
